name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QR Code Generator by QR Code KIT

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate QR code instantly for any web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our QR code generator / maker extension converts your current page into a QR code with a single click.

Easily generate QR codes from text or URLs for free.

Key features of QR code generator by QR Code KIT:

✓ Instantly create a QR code for your current webpage.
✓ Respects your privacy — no unnecessary permissions required.
✓ Completely free for all users.
✓ Generate QR codes in real-time with a simple text input.
✓ Download QR codes on vector format as SVG.
✓ Fast performance!
✓ Print QR codes directly from the extension.

⚠️ COMING SOON ⚠️

Dynamic QR code generation
Custom logo, colors, frames


⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ RATE QR CODE GENERATOR ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
If you find this extension useful, please consider leaving a review and giving us a five-star rating. We appreciate your feedback!


Updated on May 15, 2024:
– Fixed an issue with downloading the QR code in SVG format
